text: The 1776 English cricket season was the fifth in which matches have been awarded retrospective first-class cricket status. The scorecards of seven first-class matches have survived. The earliest printed cricket scorecard templates were introduced during 1776. ==Matches== Seven first-class match scorecards survive from 1776, all of them involving Hampshire XIs playing either Kent XIs or Surrey XIs.Association of Cricket Statisticians and Historians (ACS) (1981) A Guide to Important Cricket Matches Played in the British Isles 1709 – 1863. Nottingham: ACS.Results, English Domestic Season 1776, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. *5–7 June - Hampshire XI v Kent XI - Moulsey HurstHampshire XI v Kent XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. *25–26 June - Kent XI v Hampshire XI - Sevenoaks VineKent XI v Hampshire XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. *2–4 July - Hampshire XI v Kent XI - Broadhalfpenny DownHampshire XI v Kent XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. *15–17 July - Kent XI v Hampshire XI - Sevenoaks VineKent XI v Hampshire XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. *22–24 July - Hampshire XI v Kent XI - Broadhalfpenny DownHampshire XI v Kent XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. *6–8 August - Surrey XI v Hampshire XI - Laleham BurwaySurrey XI v Hampshire XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. *26–28 August - Hampshire XI v Surrey XI - Broadhalfpenny DownHampshire XI v Surrey XI, scorecard, CricInfo. Retrieved 2019-02-17. Three other matches not between county sides are known to have been played during the season. Full scorecards do not survive from these matches.Other matches in England 1776, CricketArchive. Retrieved 2019-02-10. ==Other events== A notice in the Leicester Journal of 17 August is the earliest known mention of cricket in Leicestershire. ==First mentions== ===Players=== * Richard Aubrey Veck ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:1776 in English cricket Category:English cricket seasons from 1764 to 1786
title: 1776 English cricket season
